findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized upgrade of scripts.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in BurnTokens
findings.description: The BurnTokens contract contains unprotected function calls, which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in ClaimMainReward
findings.description: The function ClaimMainReward contains unprotected function calls which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in ClaimMiscReward
findings.description: The ClaimMiscReward function has unprotected function calls.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in IncludeMeToStaking
findings.description: The functions in IncludeMeToStaking contract are unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized state changes.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in awardLottery
findings.description: The awardLottery function has unprotected calls, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in changeMainReward
findings.description: The function 'changeMainReward' contains unprotected function calls which can lead to unauthorized modifications.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in createLPandBNB
findings.description: The createLPandBNB function contains unprotected function calls which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in enableBlacklist
findings.description: The enableBlacklist function has unprotected calls which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of blacklist status.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in dynamicSettings
findings.description: Unprotected function calls in dynamicSettings may lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of settings.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in excludeAccountFromFees
findings.description: The excludeAccountFromFees function allows untrusted input and lacks access control, potentially leading to unauthorized fee exemptions.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in excludeFromStaking
findings.description: The function calls within the excludeFromStaking function are unprotected and can potentially lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in includeToStaking
findings.description: The 'includeToStaking' function makes unprotected external calls to other contracts, which can lead to reentrancy attacks or unauthorized state changes.
